name: TiktokLive game (Plants-vs-Zombies)
description:
This is one of my best interactive Tiktok Game . See my account for more details: https://www.tiktok.com/@pvrldvuhqjea23783

https://www.tiktok.com/@pvrldvuhqjea23783/video/7178480295526534402

1-You want to start you own stream on TIKTOK:
  • Buy a subscription key 40$/month: Request key here :  Discord
  • Download the game and Pay for the key on itch.io
  • All payment should be done via itch.io , for example:
    • Pay 40$ if you need the key for 30 days
  • Once the payment is done send me your Tiktok account, so that i can create a KEY for you (via Discord )
2-How it works:
  • Start Your Live
  • Run the  “弹幕拦截”  Tool
  • Enter your Tiktok Live broadcast address  (in my case it is:https://www.tiktok.com/@pvrldvuhqjea23783/live),then press “Enter” to connect
  • Run the  Game
  • Enter your subscription KEY (you have to request it after buying this game)
  • Click “冒险模式”
3-Tutorial:
  • Press any character to join the game
  • Send a gift to upgrade the zombie. The bigger the gift, the higher the zombie level
4-NOTE:

-It is important that each user must have their own method to make the live stream. (We do not Sell access to LIVE with this game)

-The most used currently are: TIKTOK LIVE STUDIO, using a stream key (not included when buying any software from us) , XSplit or OBS.

-It is important to know that streaming this type of games may entail to get Violation Warning and I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IT. The reason for that is not clear and we are trying to reach TIKTOK to resolve the issue.

5-RULES:

Do not insult / Don't spam. / Do not sell anything to users

6-QUESTIONS:
  • Do I make game under request? à yes ( it will cost you extra & delivery depends on my time )
  • Do I get follower while streaming? Yes, it is not fixed but in my case +50, 500 up to 1k per day
  • How much do you earn? It is completely random but usually from 5$ per day to 100$ (on the weekends …). But nothing is guaranty it depends on you and your account/follower etc. (this is only my experience )
